problem.markdown:
>>In the HP Case, did the improved Eclipse system yield an overall improvement from manual assembly? <<
(x) Yes ( ) No
[Explanation] The capacity with manual assembly was 200,000 printers/month and the capacity with the improved Eclipse system was 250,000 printers/month [Explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: In the HP Case, did the improved Eclipse system yield an overall improvement from manual assembly?

div.p: The capacity with manual assembly was 200,000 printers/month and the capacity with the improved Eclipse system was 250,000 printers/month
